hha-meem
tanzīlun mina al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
kitābun fuṣṣilat āyātuhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan liqawmin yaʿlamūna
bashīran wanadhīran fa-aʿraḍa aktharuhum fahum lā yasmaʿūna
waqālū qulūbunā fī akinnatin mimmā tadʿūnā ilayhi wafī ādhāninā waqrun wamin bayninā wabaynika ḥijābun fa-iʿ'mal innanā ʿāmilūna
qul innamā anā basharun mith'lukum yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun fa-is'taqīmū ilayhi wa-is'taghfirūhu wawaylun lil'mush'rikīna
alladhīna lā yu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
qul a-innakum latakfurūna bi-alladhī khalaqa al-arḍa fī yawmayni watajʿalūna lahu andādan dhālika rabbu al-ʿālamīna
wajaʿala fīhā rawāsiya min fawqihā wabāraka fīhā waqaddara fīhā aqwātahā fī arbaʿati ayyāmin sawāan lilssāilīna
thumma is'tawā ilā al-samāi wahiya dukhānun faqāla lahā walil'arḍi i'tiyā ṭawʿan aw karhan qālatā ataynā ṭāiʿīna
faqaḍāhunna sabʿa samāwātin fī yawmayni wa-awḥā fī kulli samāin amrahā wazayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bimaṣābīḥa waḥif'ẓan dhālika taqdīru al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
fa-in aʿraḍū faqul andhartukum ṣāʿiqatan mith'la ṣāʿiqati ʿādin wathamūda
idh jāathumu al-rusulu min bayni aydīhim wamin khalfihim allā taʿbudū illā al-laha qālū law shāa rabbunā la-anzala malāikatan fa-innā bimā ur'sil'tum bihi kāfirūna
fa-ammā ʿādun fa-is'takbarū fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi waqālū man ashaddu minnā quwwatan awalam yaraw anna al-laha alladhī khalaqahum huwa ashaddu min'hum quwwatan wakānū biāyātinā yajḥadūna
fa-arsalnā ʿalayhim rīḥan ṣarṣaran fī ayyāmin naḥisātin linudhīqahum ʿadhāba al-khiz'yi fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akhzā wahum lā yunṣarūna
wa-ammā thamūdu fahadaynāhum fa-is'taḥabbū al-ʿamā ʿalā al-hudā fa-akhadhathum ṣāʿiqatu al-ʿadhābi al-hūni bimā kānū yaksibūna
wanajjaynā alladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūna
wayawma yuḥ'sharu aʿdāu al-lahi ilā al-nāri fahum yūzaʿūna
ḥattā idhā mā jāūhā shahida ʿalayhim samʿuhum wa-abṣāruhum wajulūduhum bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
waqālū lijulūdihim lima shahidttum ʿalaynā qālū anṭaqanā al-lahu alladhī anṭaqa kulla shayin wahuwa khalaqakum awwala marratin wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
wamā kuntum tastatirūna an yashhada ʿalaykum samʿukum walā abṣārukum walā julūdukum walākin ẓanantum anna al-laha lā yaʿlamu kathīran mimmā taʿmalūna
wadhālikum ẓannukumu alladhī ẓanantum birabbikum ardākum fa-aṣbaḥtum mina al-khāsirīna
fa-in yaṣbirū fal-nāru mathwan lahum wa-in yastaʿtibū famā hum mina al-muʿ'tabīna
waqayyaḍnā lahum quranāa fazayyanū lahum mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum waḥaqqa ʿalayhimu al-qawlu fī umamin qad khalat min qablihim mina al-jini wal-insi innahum kānū khāsirīna
waqāla alladhīna kafarū lā tasmaʿū lihādhā al-qur'āni wal-ghaw fīhi laʿallakum taghlibūna
falanudhīqanna alladhīna kafarū ʿadhāban shadīdan walanajziyannahum aswa-a alladhī kānū yaʿmalūna
dhālika jazāu aʿdāi al-lahi al-nāru lahum fīhā dāru al-khul'di jazāan bimā kānū biāyātinā yajḥadūna
waqāla alladhīna kafarū rabbanā arinā alladhayni aḍallānā mina al-jini wal-insi najʿalhumā taḥta aqdāminā liyakūnā mina al-asfalīna
inna alladhīna qālū rabbunā al-lahu thumma is'taqāmū tatanazzalu ʿalayhimu al-malāikatu allā takhāfū walā taḥzanū wa-abshirū bil-janati allatī kuntum tūʿadūna
naḥnu awliyāukum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati walakum fīhā mā tashtahī anfusukum walakum fīhā mā taddaʿūna
nuzulan min ghafūrin raḥīmin
waman aḥsanu qawlan mimman daʿā ilā al-lahi waʿamila ṣāliḥan waqāla innanī mina al-mus'limīna
walā tastawī al-ḥasanatu walā al-sayi-atu id'faʿ bi-allatī hiya aḥsanu fa-idhā alladhī baynaka wabaynahu ʿadāwatun ka-annahu waliyyun ḥamīmun
wamā yulaqqāhā illā alladhīna ṣabarū wamā yulaqqāhā illā dhū ḥaẓẓin ʿaẓīmin
wa-immā yanzaghannaka mina al-shayṭāni nazghun fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
wamin āyātihi al-laylu wal-nahāru wal-shamsu wal-qamaru lā tasjudū lilshamsi walā lil'qamari wa-us'judū lillahi alladhī khalaqahunna in kuntum iyyāhu taʿbudūna
fa-ini is'takbarū fa-alladhīna ʿinda rabbika yusabbiḥūna lahu bi-al-layli wal-nahāri wahum lā yasamūna
wamin āyātihi annaka tarā al-arḍa khāshiʿatan fa-idhā anzalnā ʿalayhā al-māa ih'tazzat warabat inna alladhī aḥyāhā lamuḥ'yī al-mawtā innahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
inna alladhīna yul'ḥidūna fī āyātinā lā yakhfawna ʿalaynā afaman yul'qā fī al-nāri khayrun am man yatī āminan yawma al-qiyāmati iʿ'malū mā shi'tum innahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
inna alladhīna kafarū bil-dhik'ri lammā jāahum wa-innahu lakitābun ʿazīzun
lā yatīhi al-bāṭilu min bayni yadayhi walā min khalfihi tanzīlun min ḥakīmin ḥamīdin
mā yuqālu laka illā mā qad qīla lilrrusuli min qablika inna rabbaka ladhū maghfiratin wadhū ʿiqābin alīmin

walaw jaʿalnāhu qur'ānan aʿjamiyyan laqālū lawlā fuṣṣilat āyātuhu āʿ'jamiyyun waʿarabiyyun qul huwa lilladhīna āmanū hudan washifāon wa-alladhīna lā yu'minūna fī ādhānihim waqrun wahuwa ʿalayhim ʿaman ulāika yunādawna min makānin baʿīdin
walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba fa-ukh'tulifa fīhi walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laquḍiya baynahum wa-innahum lafī shakkin min'hu murībin
man ʿamila ṣāliḥan falinafsihi waman asāa faʿalayhā wamā rabbuka biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
ilayhi yuraddu ʿil'mu al-sāʿati wamā takhruju min thamarātin min akmāmihā wamā taḥmilu min unthā walā taḍaʿu illā biʿil'mihi wayawma yunādīhim ayna shurakāī qālū ādhannāka mā minnā min shahīdin
waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yadʿūna min qablu waẓannū mā lahum min maḥīṣin
lā yasamu al-insānu min duʿāi al-khayri wa-in massahu al-sharu fayaūsun qanūṭun

wala-in adhaqnāhu raḥmatan minnā min baʿdi ḍarrāa massathu layaqūlanna hādhā lī wamā aẓunnu al-sāʿata qāimatan wala-in rujiʿ'tu ilā rabbī inna lī ʿindahu lalḥus'nā falanunabbi-anna alladhīna kafarū bimā ʿamilū walanudhīqannahum min ʿadhābin ghalīẓin
wa-idhā anʿamnā ʿalā al-insāni aʿraḍa wanaā bijānibihi wa-idhā massahu al-sharu fadhū duʿāin ʿarīḍin
qul ara-aytum in kāna min ʿindi al-lahi thumma kafartum bihi man aḍallu mimman huwa fī shiqāqin baʿīdin
sanurīhim āyātinā fī al-āfāqi wafī anfusihim ḥattā yatabayyana lahum annahu al-ḥaqu awalam yakfi birabbika annahu ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
alā innahum fī mir'yatin min liqāi rabbihim alā innahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭun
